text: @pulte Hi,I'm Shaina&just beat #COVID19 !TY lord,I'm so tired but blessed.I take care of my dad,a veteran&who wld give the shirt off his back&we both have NO $.He has1outfi&I have few clothes,ALLw/holes.Few cans of food total.He owns1thing&it's the house.Hes beyond ill.Pls cont.readin
